DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess early longitudinal metabolic effect include insulin sensitivity HIV-exposed uninfected ( HEU ) child compare HIV-unexposed uninfected ( HUU ) child ; well determine difference effect neonatal zidovudine ( AZT ) vs. nevirapine ( NVP ) prophylaxis early longitudinal change insulin sensitivity first 3 year life .
DOC.brief_title: Study HIV-Infected Uninfected Pregnant Woman/Child Dyads Gabarone , Botawana
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist nest randomized component HIV-infected ( HIV+ ) -uninfected ( HIV- ) pregnant woman/child dyad Botswana take place Gaborone , Botswana Botswana-Harvard AIDS Institute Partnership 's ( BHPs ) clinical research facility . A total 300 HIV+ pregnant woman/fetus dyad cART 150 HIV- pregnant woman/fetus dyad evaluate insulin sensitivity follow child 's 3rd birthday . Amongst HEU infant , participant randomize birth 1:1 150 receive neonatal AZT prophylaxis 150 receive neonatal NVP prophylaxis . Targeted metabolomics use assess role intermediary metabolite insulin resistance directly assess mitochondrial function use Seahorse XF96e technology . At time study enrollment , woman must willing exclusively breastfeed infant 's first 6 month life . If utero neonatal HIV/ARV exposures find associated derangement intermediary metabolism HEU infant increase risk insulin resistance 3 year age , would impact screen prevention strategy diabetes vulnerable population argue research identify prenatal neonatal ARV regimens superior PMTCT efficacy minimal adverse metabolic consequence .
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected uninfected pregnant woman 1636 week GA eligible study enrollment . Women must 18 year older able provide inform consent infant participate study Participants must Botswana citizen Women must evidence HIVinfected status , either documentation HIVpositive test documentation HIV treatment , undergo HIV test counsel rapid diagnostic test confirm HIV status time enrollment documentation HIVpositive status provide . HIVuninfected woman must willing undergo HIV pretest counseling , rapid HIV test posttest counseling , refer HIV Testing Counseling ( HTC ) pregnancy . Women must willing remain study area infant attend schedule study visit describe child 's 3rd birthday For HIVinfected woman , must TDF/3TC FTC/EFV TDF/3TC FTC/Dolutegravir time study enrollment willing initiate treatment continue throughout period breastfeeding , lifetime . All woman must willing breastfeed exclusively first six month life . All enrol infant must product singleton birth . If mother enrol study antenatally deliver twin triplet , mother place study count toward accrual goal . Preexisting maternal diabetes mellitus HIV+ pregnant woman < 4 week cART prior delivery HIV RNA level > 400 copies/mL delivery Infants congenital anomaly life threaten illness birth would likely preclude survival 12 month age .
